variants.desc:
The leader of a squad of Belobog's Silvermane Guards.
Silvermane Lieutenants can raise a giant shield during combat and Enhance themselves. Attacking a Silvermane Lieutenant with their shield raised will immediately result in a fierce Counter.

skills.name: Pierce
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Assault
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Shield Reflect
skills.desc: Enters the Counter state. When attacked by a single character, acts immediately and casts "Pierce" on the attacker.

skills.name: Reinforcement
skills.desc: Summons Silvermane Soldier or Silvermane Gunner

variants.name: Silvermane Lieutenant (Bug)
variants.desc:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The original reference entity is the leader of a squad of Belobog's Silvermane Guards.
As long as there are remaining friendly units, Silvermane Lieutenants will persistently raise a giant shield during combat. Attacking a Silvermane Lieutenant with their shield raised will result in a fierce counterattack.

skills.name: Rallying
skills.desc: Increases all friendly units' ATK and causes them to act immediately.

skills.name: Assault
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Pierce
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Shield Reflect
skills.desc: Goes into the Counter state. When attacked by a single character, gains 1 extra turn and deals Physical DMG to the target.

skills.name: Reinforcement
skills.desc: Summons Silvermane Soldier or Silvermane Gunner

variants.name: Silvermane Lieutenant (Complete)
variants.desc: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The original reference entity is the leader of a squad of Belobog's Silvermane Guards.

skills.name: Pierce
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Assault
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.
